001package com.technototes.library.hardware.motor;
002
003import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor;
004import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorEx;
005import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorSimple;
006import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.PIDFCoefficients;
007
008import com.technototes.library.hardware.Sensored;
009import com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.encoder.Encoder;
010import com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.encoder.MotorEncoder;
011
012/** Class for encoded motors
013 * @author Alex Stedman
014 * @param <T> The qualcomm motor device interface
015 */
016@SuppressWarnings("unused")
017public class EncodedMotor<T extends DcMotorSimple> extends Motor<T> implements Sensored {
018
019    /** Deadzone for going to positions with encoder
020     *
021     */
022    public double positionThreshold = 50;
023
024    private Encoder encoder;
025
026    /** Make encoded motor
027     *
028     * @param device The dcmotor object
029     */
030    public EncodedMotor(T device, Encoder e) {
031        super(device);
032        encoder = e;
033    }
034
035    public EncodedMotor(String device, Encoder e) {
036        super(device);
037        encoder = e;
038    }
039
040    public EncodedMotor(T device) {
041        super(device);
042        if (device instanceof DcMotorEx) {
043            encoder = new MotorEncoder((DcMotorEx) device);
044        }
045    }
046
047    /** Make encoded motor
048     *
049     * @param deviceName The dcmotor device name in hardware map
050     */
051    public EncodedMotor(String deviceName) {
052        super(deviceName);
053        if (getDevice() instanceof DcMotorEx) {
054            encoder = new MotorEncoder((DcMotorEx) getDevice());
055        }
056    }
057
058    public EncodedMotor<T> setEncoder(Encoder enc) {
059        encoder = enc;
060        return this;
061    }
062
063    public EncodedMotor<T> setPIDFCoeffecients(double p, double i, double d, double f) {
064        if (getDevice() instanceof DcMotorEx) {
065            ((DcMotorEx) getDevice()).setVelocityPIDFCoefficients(p, i, d, f);
066        }
067        return this;
068    }
069
070    public EncodedMotor<T> setPIDFCoeffecients(PIDFCoefficients coeffecients) {
071        return setPIDFCoeffecients(coeffecients.p, coeffecients.i, coeffecients.d, coeffecients.f);
072    }
073
074    public EncodedMotor<T> setRunMode(DcMotor.RunMode m) {
075        if (getDevice() instanceof DcMotor) ((DcMotor) getDevice()).setMode(m);
076        return this;
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public EncodedMotor<T> setInverted(boolean invert) {
081        getDevice().setDirection(invert ? DcMotorSimple.Direction.FORWARD : DcMotorSimple.Direction.REVERSE);
082        return this;
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    public EncodedMotor<T> invert() {
087        return setInverted(!getInverted());
088    }
089
090    @Override
091    public double getSensorValue() {
092        return encoder.getSensorValue();
093    }
094    //
095    //    @Override
096    //    public void setPIDValues(double p, double i, double d) {
097    //        coefficients = new PIDCoefficients(p, i, d);
098    //    }
099
100    //    @Override
101    //    public boolean setPositionPID(double val) {
102    //        if (!isAtPosition(val)) {
103    //            setSpeed(MathUtils.constrain(-0.1,(val-getSensorValue())/(coefficients.kP*10000), 0.1)*10);
104    //        } else {
105    //            setSpeed(0);
106    //            return true;
107    //        }
108    //        return false;
109    //    }
110
111    /** Set the position of the motor
112     *
113     * @param ticks The encoder ticks
114     * @return Is the motor at this position
115     */
116    public boolean setPosition(double ticks) {
117        return setPosition(ticks, 0.5);
118    }
119    /** Set the position of the motor
120     *
121     * @param ticks The encoder ticks
122     * @param speed The speed to run the motor at
123     * @return Is the motor at this position
124     */
125    public boolean setPosition(double ticks, double speed) {
126        if (!isAtPosition(ticks)) {
127            setSpeed(getSensorValue() < ticks ? speed : -speed);
128        } else {
129            setSpeed(0);
130            return true;
131        }
132        return false;
133    }
134
135    /** Is the motor at the specified position
136     *
137     * @param ticks The position
138     * @return Is the motor here or not
139     */
140    public boolean isAtPosition(double ticks) {
141        return Math.abs(ticks - getSensorValue()) < positionThreshold;
142    }
143
144    /** Get the encoder object
145     *
146     * @return The encoder
147     */
148    public Encoder getEncoder() {
149        return encoder;
150    }
151
152    /** Zero the encoder
153     * @return This
154     */
155    public EncodedMotor<T> tare() {
156        encoder.zeroEncoder();
157        return this;
158    }
159
160    @Override
161    public Double get() {
162        return getSensorValue();
163    }
164
165    /** Set velocity of motor in tps
166     *
167     * @param tps the speed in encoder ticks per second
168     */
169    public void setVelocity(double tps) {
170        if (getDevice() instanceof DcMotor) {
171            ((DcMotor) getDevice()).setMode(DcMotor.RunMode.RUN_USING_ENCODER);
172            getDevice().setPower(tps);
173        }
174    }
175
176    public double getVelocity() {
177        return getDevice().getPower();
178    }
179
180    @Override
181    public double getSpeed() {
182        return getDevice().getPower();
183    }
184
185    @Override
186    public void setSpeed(double speed) {
187        // if(getDevice() instanceof DcMotor) ((DcMotor) getDevice()).setMode(DcMotor.RunMode.RUN_WITHOUT_ENCODER);
188        super.setSpeed(speed);
189    }
190
191    @Override
192    public EncodedMotor<T> brake() {
193        return (EncodedMotor<T>) super.brake();
194    }
195
196    @Override
197    public EncodedMotor<T> coast() {
198        return (EncodedMotor<T>) super.coast();
199    }
200
201    @Override
202    public EncodedMotor<T> setLimits(double mi, double ma) {
203        return (EncodedMotor<T>) super.setLimits(mi, ma);
204    }
205}
